      class="note"
      version="1.0"
      default-locale="en-US-x-translit-ja-alalc97-x-translat-en">

  </info>

    <layout>
      <names variable="authority">
        <name/>
        <institution institution-parts="short"/>

    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
